languages.text: Нихель, техносестра Паскаля Ханейманна и его соратница в рядах Коллектива Амарнат, заманила Вольного Торговца и е{mf|го|е} спутника в ловушку. Необходимо уничтожить ее и ее свиту.
Nihel, Pasqal Haneumann's tech-sister and fellow member of the Amarnat Collective, has lured the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} companion into a trap. She and her retinue must be destroyed.
languages.original_text: Нихель, техносестра Паскаля Ханейманна и его соратница в рядах Коллектива Амарнат, заманила Вольного Торговца и е{mf|го|е} спутника в ловушку. Необходимо уничтожить ее и ее свиту.

languages.text: Nihel, la technoconsœur de Pasqal Haneumann et membre du collectif Amarnat, a attiré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et son compagnon dans un piège. Elle doit être éliminée, de même que son entourage.
languages.original_text: Nihel, Pasqal Haneumann's tech-sister and fellow member of the Amarnat Collective, has lured the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} companion into a trap. She and her retinue must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Nihel, la technoconsœur de Pasqal Haneumann et membre du collectif Amarnat, a attiré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et son compagnon dans un piège. Elle doit être éliminée, de même que son entourage.

languages.text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼的技术姐妹妮赫尔将行商浪人与{mf|他|她}的同伴引诱到了陷阱之中。妮赫尔是阿玛纳特聚合意识的成员之一，行商浪人必须消灭她和她的随从。
languages.original_text: Nihel, Pasqal Haneumann's tech-sister and fellow member of the Amarnat Collective, has lured the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} companion into a trap. She and her retinue must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼的技术姐妹雅珀将行商浪人与{mf|他|她}的同伴引诱到了陷阱之中。雅珀是阿玛纳特聚合意识的成员之一，行商浪人必须消灭她和她的随从。

languages.text: パスカル・ヘニュマンの姉妹でありアマルナト集合体の構成員であるニヘルは、自由開拓者とその仲間を罠に誘い込んだ。彼女とその従者を始末しなければならない。
languages.original_text: Nihel, Pasqal Haneumann's tech-sister and fellow member of the Amarnat Collective, has lured the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} companion into a trap. She and her retinue must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: パスカル・ヘニュマンの姉妹でありアマルナト集合体の構成員であるニヘルは、自由開拓者とその仲間を罠に誘い込んだ。彼女とその従者を始末しなければならない。

languages.text: Nihel, Pasqal Haneumanns Tech-Schwester und ebenfalls Mitglied des Amarnat-Kollektivs, hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und {mf|seinen|ihren} Gefährten in eine Falle gelockt. Sie und ihr Gefolge müssen vernichtet werden.
languages.original_text: Nihel, Pasqal Haneumann's tech-sister and fellow member of the Amarnat Collective, has lured the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} companion into a trap. She and her retinue must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Nihel, Pasqal Haneumanns Tech-Schwester und ebenfalls Mitglied des Amarnat-Kollektivs, hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und {mf|seinen|ihren} Gefährten in eine Falle gelockt. Sie und ihr Gefolge müssen vernichtet werden.

languages.text: Nihel, la tecnohermana de Pasqal Haneumann y miembro del Colectivo Amarnat, ha atraído a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y a su compañero a una trampa. Es necesario acabar con ella y con su séquito.
languages.original_text: Nihel, Pasqal Haneumann's tech-sister and fellow member of the Amarnat Collective, has lured the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} companion into a trap. She and her retinue must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Nihel, la tecnohermana de Pasqal Haneumann y miembro del Colectivo Amarnat, ha atraído a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y a su compañero a una trampa. Es necesario acabar con ella y con su séquito.

languages.text: Pasqal Haneumann'ın tekno kardeşi ve Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün saygın bir mensubu olan Nihel, Hür Tacir ve yoldaşlarını bir tuzağa çekti. O ve maiyeti yok edilmeli.
languages.original_text: Nihel, Pasqal Haneumann's tech-sister and fellow member of the Amarnat Collective, has lured the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} companion into a trap. She and her retinue must be destroyed.
